abstract: Chicago Cubs long history of futility and awful bad still fuels doubts despite their having best record in major leagues and being in midst of especially hot winning streak.
lead_paragraph: The Cubs have an 11-game win streak entering the weekend and the best record in the majors, but potential panic is never far from the team that last won the World Series in 1908.
snippet: The Cubs have an 11-game win streak entering the weekend and the best record in the majors, but potential panic is never far from the team that last won the World Series in 1908....

headline.main: A Long History of Heartbreak Shadows the Cubs’ Dominant Season
headline.print_headline: Cubs’ Dominance Challenges a Sad History
